properties.name: Yellowstone National Park
properties.description: First National Park in the United States, known for geothermal features and wildlife

properties.name: Yosemite National Park
properties.description: Famous for granite cliffs, waterfalls, giant sequoia groves, and biological diversity

properties.name: Grand Canyon National Park
properties.description: Steep-sided canyon carved by the Colorado River, exhibiting two billion years of geological history

properties.name: Zion National Park
properties.description: Notable for its steep red cliffs and unique geography carved by the Virgin River

properties.name: Rocky Mountain National Park
properties.description: Features mountain environments, alpine lakes, and diverse wildlife in the Rocky Mountains

properties.name: Acadia National Park

properties.name: Olympic National Park
properties.description: Features diverse ecosystems from glacier-capped mountains to temperate rainforests

properties.name: Great Smoky Mountains National Park

properties.name: Glacier National Park

properties.name: Grand Teton National Park

properties.name: Sequoia National Park

properties.name: Everglades National Park

properties.name: Badlands National Park
